entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this evening and risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 40 percent chance of showers late in the morning and in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High 20. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 9 May 2023
